title: SET_WAVE_QUAD_BOUNDS
content:
0x1FCC1FAF// SetWaveQuadBounds
BOOL SET_WAVE_QUAD_BOUNDS(int waveQuad, int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY);Parameters:waveQuad: The wave quad indexminX: The minX coordinateminY: The minY coordinatemaxX: The maxX coordinatemaxY: The maxY coordinateReturns: Returns true on success.This native allows you to update the bounds of a specified water quad index.Examples:Lualocal success = SetWaveQuadBounds(0, -5000, -5000, 5000, 5000)
codeBlocks:
// SetWaveQuadBounds
BOOL SET_WAVE_QUAD_BOUNDS(int waveQuad, int minX, int minY, int maxX, int maxY);
